class.name: vizzy_rviz_plugins/WasdTeleopTool
class.description:
A tool allowing simple diff-drive style robot base control like a Gamer. W, S controls the linear velocity of the robots and pressing the Shift boosts this velocity. A, D controls the angular velocity. Q and E command the angular velocity with boosted values.
Use the 'less than' key to activate/deactive the tool.
